info.title: Microsoft Foundry
info.description: Connect to Microsoft Foundry for model inference, AI Agents, Speech (transcription/translation/TTS/batch), Translator, Language (sentiment/NER/entity linking), Document Intelligence, Content Safety, Vision (analysis/OCR), AI Evaluation, Speaker Recognition, Custom Vision, Personalizer, AI Search, and MCP protocol support.

post.description: Generate a chat completion response from the AI model. Supports multi-turn conversations with system, user, and assistant messages.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: extra-parameters
parameters.description: Controls handling of extra parameters not defined by the API (error, drop, pass-through).

messages.description: The collection of context messages for the chat completions request.

role.description: The role of the message author.

model.description: ID of the specific AI model to use, if more than one model is available on the endpoint.

temperature.description: Sampling temperature (0-1). Higher values increase randomness. Default: 0.7.

max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate.

frequency_penalty.description: Penalizes tokens based on cumulative frequency (-2 to 2). Default: 0.

presence_penalty.description: Penalizes tokens already present in text (-2 to 2). Default: 0.

stop.description: Sequences that will stop completions generation.

seed.description: Seed for deterministic sampling. Same seed with same parameters should return same result.

response_format.description: Specifies the output format the model must use (text, json_object, or json_schema).

tools.description: A list of tools (functions) the model may call.

name.description: The name of the function to call.

description.description: A description of what the function does.

parameters.description: The function parameters as JSON Schema.

tool_choice.description: Controls which tool the model uses (none, auto, or a function name).

post.description: Generate a chat completion using an Azure OpenAI deployment. Use this for deployments created in Azure OpenAI Service.

parameters.name: deployment
parameters.description: The name of your Azure OpenAI deployment (e.g., 'gpt-4o').

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

messages.description: The collection of context messages for the chat completions request.

role.description: The role of the message author.

temperature.description: Sampling temperature (0-1). Higher values increase randomness.

max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate.

post.description: Return embedding vectors for given text prompts. Embeddings measure the relatedness of text strings.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: extra-parameters
parameters.description: Controls handling of extra parameters not defined by the API (error, drop, pass-through).

input.description: Input text to embed. Pass an array of strings to embed multiple inputs.

model.description: ID of the specific AI model to use, if more than one model is available on the endpoint.

dimensions.description: The number of dimensions for the output embeddings. Null uses model default.

encoding_format.description: The desired format for the returned embeddings.

input_type.description: The type of the input (text, query, or document).

post.description: Return embedding vectors for given images. Supports base64-encoded image input with optional text.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: extra-parameters
parameters.description: Controls handling of extra parameters not defined by the API (error, drop, pass-through).

input.description: Input images to embed. Each item contains an image and optional text.

image.description: The input image encoded as a base64 data URL. Example: data:image/png;base64,{data}.

text.description: Optional text input to feed into the model (for CLIP, DINO, etc.).

model.description: ID of the specific AI model to use, if more than one model is available on the endpoint.

dimensions.description: The number of dimensions for the output embeddings. Null uses model default.

encoding_format.description: The desired format for the returned embeddings.

input_type.description: The type of the input (text, query, or document).

get.description: Returns information about the AI model deployed at the endpoint, including name, type, and provider.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

get.description: Returns a list of AI assistants.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of assistants to return (1-100). Default: 20.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order by created_at timestamp.

post.description: Create an AI assistant with a model and instructions.

model.description: The model deployment name to use.

name.description: The name of the assistant (max 256 chars).

instructions.description: System instructions for the assistant (max 256,000 chars).

tools.description: Tools enabled on the assistant (code_interpreter, file_search, function).

metadata.description: Key-value pairs for storing additional information.

parameters.name: assistant_id
parameters.description: The ID of the assistant to retrieve.

parameters.name: assistant_id
parameters.description: The ID of the assistant to delete.

post.description: Create a conversation thread.

messages.description: Initial messages to start the thread with.

metadata.description: Key-value pairs for storing additional information.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The ID of the thread to retrieve.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The ID of the thread to delete.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The ID of the thread.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of messages to return (1-100). Default: 20.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order by created_at timestamp.

post.description: Create a message in a thread.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The ID of the thread.

role.description: The role of the message author.

metadata.description: Key-value pairs for storing additional information.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The ID of the thread.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of runs to return (1-100). Default: 20.

post.description: Create a run to execute an assistant on a thread.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The ID of the thread to run.

assistant_id.description: The ID of the assistant to use.

model.description: Override the model for this run.

instructions.description: Override the assistant's instructions for this run.

metadata.description: Key-value pairs for storing additional information.

parameters.name: thread_id
parameters.description: The ID of the thread.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: The ID of the run to retrieve.

post.description: Create a thread and run it in one request.

assistant_id.description: The ID of the assistant to use.

messages.description: Messages to start the thread with.

model.description: Override the model for this run.

post.description: Model Context Protocol endpoint for Copilot Studio integration. Handles JSON-RPC 2.0 requests.
Analyze text content for harmful material including Hate, SelfHarm, Sexual, and Violence categories.

text.description: The text to be analyzed (max 10,000 Unicode characters).

categories.description: Categories to analyze. If not specified, all categories are analyzed.

blocklistNames.description: Names of custom blocklists to check against.

haltOnBlocklistHit.description: When true, stop further analysis if blocklist is hit.

post.description: Analyze image content for harmful material including Hate, SelfHarm, Sexual, and Violence categories.

categories.description: Categories to analyze. If not specified, all categories are analyzed.

post.description: Analyze images for tags, objects, captions, text (OCR), smart crops, and people detection.

parameters.name: features
parameters.description: Visual features to analyze (comma-separated): tags, objects, caption, denseCaptions, read, smartCrops, people.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language for output generation (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr').

parameters.name: gender-neutral-caption
parameters.description: Enable gender-neutral captioning.

parameters.name: smartcrops-aspect-ratios
parameters.description: Aspect ratios for smart crops (0.75-1.8, comma-separated).

parameters.name: model-name
parameters.description: Custom trained model name (if using custom model instead of features).

url.description: Publicly reachable URL of the image to analyze.

post.description: Submit content for AI-assisted evaluation including groundedness, relevance, coherence, fluency, and safety metrics.

context.description: Ground truth or context for evaluating groundedness.

202.description: Evaluation submitted. Use operation ID to get results.

get.description: Get the result of an AI evaluation operation.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: The operation ID from the submit response.

post.description: Transcribes audio into the input language. Requires a Whisper model deployment.

parameters.name: deployment_id
parameters.description: The deployment name of the Whisper model.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The audio file to transcribe (mp3, mp4, mpeg, mpga, m4a, wav, webm).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the input audio in ISO-639-1 format (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr').

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Optional text to guide the model's style or continue a previous segment.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.description: Output format for the transcription.

parameters.name: temperature
parameters.description: Sampling temperature (0-1). Default: 0.

post.description: Translates audio into English text. Requires a Whisper model deployment.

parameters.name: deployment_id
parameters.description: The deployment name of the Whisper model.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The audio file to translate (mp3, mp4, mpeg, mpga, m4a, wav, webm).

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description: Optional text to guide the model's style. Should be in English.

parameters.name: response_format
parameters.description: Output format for the translation.

parameters.name: temperature
parameters.description: Sampling temperature (0-1). Default: 0.

post.description: Translates text into one or more languages using Azure Translator.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Target language code(s). Use comma-separated codes for multiple: 'fr,de,es'.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Source language code. If omitted, language is auto-detected.

parameters.name: textType
parameters.description: Type of text being translated.

Text.description: Text to translate (max 10,000 characters per element).

post.description: Converts text from one script to another (e.g., Japanese Kanji to Latin characters).

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the text (e.g., 'ja' for Japanese, 'ar' for Arabic).

parameters.name: fromScript
parameters.description: Source script (e.g., 'Jpan' for Japanese, 'Arab' for Arabic).

parameters.name: toScript
parameters.description: Target script (e.g., 'Latn' for Latin).

post.description: Detects the language of the input text using Azure Translator.
Analyze text for sentiment, entities, key phrases, PII, and more using Azure Language service.

language.description: Language code (e.g., 'en'). Optional if using language detection.

parameters.description: Optional analysis parameters.

post.description: Analyze documents using Document Intelligence prebuilt or custom models. Returns operation ID for async results.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: Model ID to use (e.g., 'prebuilt-layout', 'prebuilt-invoice', 'prebuilt-receipt', 'prebuilt-read').

parameters.name: features
parameters.description: Additional features: 'ocr.highResolution', 'ocr.formula', 'ocr.font', 'queryFields.premium' (comma-separated).

urlSource.description: URL of the document to analyze.

get.description: Get the result of a document analysis operation.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: Model ID used for analysis.

parameters.name: resultId
parameters.description: Result ID from the analyze operation.

post.description: Answer questions using a custom question answering knowledge base. Provide a question and get the best matching answers from your project.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of your custom question answering project.

parameters.name: deploymentName
parameters.description: The deployment name (e.g., 'production' or 'test').

question.description: The question to ask the knowledge base.

top.description: Maximum number of answers to return.

200.description: Question answering response with matching answers.

post.description: Analyze user utterances using Conversational Language Understanding to detect intents and extract entities.

id.description: Unique ID for this conversation item.

parameters.description: CLU parameters.

200.description: Conversation analysis result with intents and entities.

post.description: Detect if the latest point in a time series is an anomaly. Ideal for real-time monitoring scenarios.

series.description: Time series data points with timestamps and values.

sensitivity.description: Anomaly detection sensitivity (0-99). Lower = more sensitive.

200.description: Anomaly detection result for the last point.

post.description: Detect anomalies across an entire time series. Best for batch analysis of historical data.

series.description: Time series data points with timestamps and values.

sensitivity.description: Anomaly detection sensitivity (0-99). Lower = more sensitive.

200.description: Anomaly detection results for entire series.

post.description: Detect human faces in an image and return face locations. Optionally analyze face attributes like age, emotion, glasses, etc.

parameters.name: returnFaceAttributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated face attributes to return.

parameters.name: returnFaceLandmarks
parameters.description: Return face landmarks (eyes, nose, mouth positions).

parameters.name: detectionModel
parameters.description: Detection model to use.

parameters.name: recognitionModel
parameters.description: Recognition model for face identification.

url.description: URL of the image to analyze.

200.description: Detected faces with locations and optional attributes.

post.description: Extract healthcare entities from clinical text including conditions, medications, dosages, and relationships between them.

parameters.description: Task parameters.

get.description: Retrieve the results of a healthcare text analysis job.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID from the analyze healthcare operation.

post.description: Convert text to natural-sounding speech audio using Azure Speech Services.

parameters.name: X-Microsoft-OutputFormat
parameters.description: Audio output format.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: SSML document specifying the text and voice.

post.description: Create a new speaker verification profile for voice biometrics.
Verify a speaker's identity against an enrolled profile using voice biometrics.

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: The speaker profile ID to verify against.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Audio file (WAV format) for verification.

post.description: Add voice enrollment audio to a speaker profile for training.

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: The speaker profile ID to enroll.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Audio file (WAV format) for enrollment.

post.description: Classify an image using a Custom Vision classification model.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The Custom Vision project ID.

parameters.name: publishedName
parameters.description: The published iteration name.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Image binary data.

post.description: Detect objects in an image using a Custom Vision object detection model.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The Custom Vision project ID.

parameters.name: publishedName
parameters.description: The published iteration name.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Image binary data.

post.description: Get personalized ranking of actions based on context using Personalizer.

deferActivation.description: Defer activation until reward is sent.

post.description: Send a reward score to Personalizer based on user interaction.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The event ID from the rank call.

post.description: Search an Azure AI Search index using full-text, filter, and vector queries.

parameters.name: indexName
parameters.description: The name of the search index.

select.description: Comma-separated list of fields to retrieve.

searchMode.description: Search mode (any or all terms must match).

searchFields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to search.

semanticConfiguration.description: Semantic configuration name (required when queryType is 'semantic').

captions.description: Captions mode for semantic search (extractive or none).

answers.description: Answers mode for semantic search (extractive or none).

k.description: Number of nearest neighbors to return.

post.description: Extract printed and handwritten text from images using OCR.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr'). Auto-detected if not specified.

parameters.name: pages
parameters.description: Page numbers to analyze (e.g., '1-3,5').

parameters.name: readingOrder
parameters.description: Reading order algorithm.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Image URL or binary data.

url.description: URL of the image to analyze.

get.description: Retrieve the results of a text extraction (OCR) operation.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: The operation ID from the read request.

post.description: Start a batch transcription job for large-scale audio processing.

displayName.description: Display name for the transcription job.

contentUrls.description: URLs of audio files to transcribe.

contentContainerUrl.description: Azure Blob container URL with audio files.

get.description: Get the status and details of a batch transcription job.

parameters.name: transcriptionId
parameters.description: The transcription job ID.

get.description: Get the output files from a completed batch transcription.

parameters.name: transcriptionId
parameters.description: The transcription job ID.

id.description: A unique identifier for this chat completions response.

created.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) when the completion was created.

model.description: The model used for the chat completion.

choices.description: The collection of completion choices generated.

finish_reason.description: The reason the completion finished (stop, length, content_filter, tool_calls).

role.description: The role of the message author.

tool_calls.description: Tool calls requested by the model.

id.description: The ID of the tool call.

name.description: The name of the function to call.

arguments.description: The function arguments in JSON format.

prompt_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the prompt.

completion_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the completion.

id.description: Unique identifier for the embeddings result.

model.description: The model ID used to generate embeddings.

data.description: The embedding vectors for the submitted inputs.

index.description: The index of the input this embedding corresponds to.

prompt_tokens.description: Number of tokens in the request.

model_name.description: The name of the AI model (e.g., Phi-3.5-mini-instruct).

model_type.description: The type of AI model (chat-completion or embeddings).

created_at.description: Unix timestamp when the assistant was created.

model.description: The model used by the assistant.

instructions.description: The system instructions for the assistant.

created_at.description: Unix timestamp when the thread was created.
Unix timestamp when the message was created.

thread_id.description: The thread this message belongs to.

role.description: The role of the message author.

assistant_id.description: The assistant that authored this message (if any).

run_id.description: The run that generated this message (if any).

created_at.description: Unix timestamp when the run was created.

thread_id.description: The thread this run belongs to.

assistant_id.description: The assistant used for this run.

started_at.description: Unix timestamp when the run started.

expires_at.description: Unix timestamp when the run expires.

completed_at.description: Unix timestamp when the run completed.

failed_at.description: Unix timestamp when the run failed.

model.description: The model used for this run.

instructions.description: The instructions used for this run.

last_error.description: The last error if the run failed.

category.description: The harm category (Hate, SelfHarm, Sexual, Violence).
The harm category (Hate, SelfHarm, Sexual, Violence).

operationId.description: Operation ID to check evaluation status.

score.description: Evaluation score (0-5 for quality metrics, 0-7 for safety).

passed.description: Whether the content passed safety evaluation.

duration.description: Duration of the audio in seconds.

translations.description: Translation results for each target language.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: When the operation was last updated.

answers.description: List of matching answers from the knowledge base.

isAnomaly.description: Whether the last point is an anomaly.

period.description: Detected period of the time series.
Detected period of the time series.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: When the job was last updated.
When the profile was last updated.

enrollmentsLength.description: Total enrollment audio length in seconds.

@odata.nextLink.description: URL for next page of results.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: When the job was last updated.
When the operation was last updated.

lastActionDateTime.description: When the transcription was last updated.

contentUrl.description: URL to download the file content.
